speaker: Archmage
lines: Power is a river; drink too deep and it drowns you.
Yet the world moves for those who dare.
He looks at you with a keen eye, as if he can see into your soul.
'The path to power is fraught with peril, but the rewards are great.'
'You are weak, we must prepare you.
'You will be taught the ways of Power.
'Come with me child, and I will teach you.'
He takes you to a domed room, the walls are covered in runes and symbols you have never seen before.
A large pool of water is in the center of the room, the water is a deep red color, you can feel the energy of the water filling the room.
The archmage stands in front of the pool, he is wearing a long robe, and a hooded cloak.
To make you strong, you must drink from the river of power.
'Are you ready to drink from the river of power?' He asks you.

choices.text: I am ready to drink from the river of power.
I am not ready to drink from the river of power.
